content.question: Which of the following most shaped the events described in the excerpt?

choices.label: The establishment of African slavery in the Spanish colonies
The demands of the encomienda system in the Spanish colonies
The amount of Spanish intermarriage with Native Americans
The importance of Old World crops to the subsistence of Spanish colonial subjects

content.answer: The demands of the encomienda system in the Spanish colonies

topic.text: 1.5: Labor, Slavery, and Caste in the Spanish Colonial System

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
